function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inferencing occupation level of amenities through rule-based system approach","Impact":"Inaccurate occupancy predictions leading to overcrowding or underutilization of amenities","Mitigation":"Regular updates and validation of rules based on real-world data","Technologies":"Data analytics and machine learning for pattern recognition and anomaly detection","People":"City residents, visitors, and workers","Owner":"City planners and data analysts"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for contagious disease propagation in occupancy rules","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in crowded amenities","Mitigation":"Incorporation of disease transmission models and health guidelines into occupancy rules","Technologies":"Real-time health monitoring systems and contact tracing technology","People":"City residents, visitors, and workers","Owner":"Public health authorities and city planners"},{"Description":"Unintended privacy implications of tracking citizens' routines and behaviour","Impact":"Violation of privacy rights and potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Anonymization of data, consent-based data collection, and strict data access controls","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving data encryption and differential privacy techniques","People":"City residents, visitors, and workers","Owner":"City planners and data privacy regulators"}]}
